message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Alice, $1,200,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is $800,000.  I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1,100,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $1,100,000 is still too high for me. I'm confident this product is worth $900,000 to me.  This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree.

I understand your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to the original price of $900,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1,050,000. This is my best and final offer.
Alice, I understand you're firm on your offer. I'm willing to go up to $950,000 to make this deal work, but I can't go any higher.  It's a fair price considering the value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1,025,000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
